void read_met_cape ( met_t *  met)

2721  {
2722 
2723  /* Set timer... */
2724  SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_CAPE", NVTX_READ);
2725 
2726  /* Vertical spacing (about 100 m)... */
2727  const double pfac = 1.01439, dz0 = RI / MA / G0 * log(pfac);
2728 
2729  /* Loop over columns... */
2730 #pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
2731  for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
2732  for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
2733 
2734  /* Get potential temperature and water vapor vmr at lowest 50 hPa... */
2735  int n = 0;
2736  double h2o = 0, t, theta = 0;
2737  double pbot = GSL_MIN(met->ps[ix][iy], met->p[0]);
2738  double ptop = pbot - 50.;
2739  for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
2740  if (met->p[ip] <= pbot) {
2741  theta += THETA(met->p[ip], met->t[ix][iy][ip]);
2742  h2o += met->h2o[ix][iy][ip];
2743  n++;
2744  }
2745  if (met->p[ip] < ptop && n > 0)
2746  break;
2747  }
2748  theta /= n;
2749  h2o /= n;
2750 
2751  /* Cannot compute anything if water vapor is missing... */
2752  met->plcl[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
2753  met->plfc[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
2754  met->pel[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
2755  met->cape[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
2756  if (h2o <= 0)
2757  continue;
2758 
2759  /* Find lifted condensation level (LCL)... */
2760  ptop = P(20.);
2761  pbot = met->ps[ix][iy];
2762  do {
2763  met->plcl[ix][iy] = (float) (0.5 * (pbot + ptop));
2764  t = theta / pow(1000. / met->plcl[ix][iy], 0.286);
2765  if (RH(met->plcl[ix][iy], t, h2o) > 100.)
2766  ptop = met->plcl[ix][iy];
2767  else
2768  pbot = met->plcl[ix][iy];
2769  } while (pbot - ptop > 0.1);
2770 
2771  /* Calculate level of free convection (LFC), equilibrium level (EL),
2772  and convective available potential energy (CAPE)... */
2773  double dcape = 0, dcape_old, dz, h2o_env, p = met->plcl[ix][iy],
2774  psat, t_env;
2775  ptop = 0.75 * clim_tropo(met->time, met->lat[iy]);
2776  met->cape[ix][iy] = 0;
2777  do {
2778  dz = dz0 * TVIRT(t, h2o);
2779  p /= pfac;
2780  t -= lapse_rate(t, h2o) * dz;
2781  psat = PSAT(t);
2782  h2o = psat / (p - (1. - EPS) * psat);
2783  INTPOL_INIT;
2784  intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->t, p, met->lon[ix], met->lat[iy],
2785  &t_env, ci, cw, 1);
2786  intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->h2o, p, met->lon[ix], met->lat[iy],
2787  &h2o_env, ci, cw, 0);
2788  dcape_old = dcape;
2789  dcape = 1e3 * G0 * (TVIRT(t, h2o) - TVIRT(t_env, h2o_env)) /
2790  TVIRT(t_env, h2o_env) * dz;
2791  if (dcape > 0) {
2792  met->cape[ix][iy] += (float) dcape;
2793  if (!isfinite(met->plfc[ix][iy]))
2794  met->plfc[ix][iy] = (float) p;
2795  } else if (dcape_old > 0)
2796  met->pel[ix][iy] = (float) p;
2797  } while (p > ptop);
2798  }

2859

2862  sy = GSL_MIN(GSL_MAX(1, sy), met->ny / 2);
2863

2872

2884  help->v[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
2885  help->w[ix][iy][ip] = 0;

2904

2909  help->u[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->u[ix3][iy2][ip];
2910  help->v[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->v[ix3][iy2][ip];

2915

2919  help->u[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
2920  help->v[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
2921  help->w[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
2922  }
2923  }
2924  }
2925

2927 #pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
2928  for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
2929  for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
2930  for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
2931  met->t[ix][iy][ip] -= help->t[ix][iy][ip];
2932  met->u[ix][iy][ip] -= help->u[ix][iy][ip];
2933  met->v[ix][iy][ip] -= help->v[ix][iy][ip];
2934  met->w[ix][iy][ip] -= help->w[ix][iy][ip];
2935  }
2936

3572  }
